articles.author: Sammy Westfall
articles.title: Western Japan volcano, Sakurajima, erupts; alert level raised
articles.description: Some residents have been evacuated, and there have been no immediate reports of damage or casualties.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
A volcano in western Japan erupted on Sunday evening, sending a large plume of black smoke into the sky and spewing rocks.

articles.title: Biden's condition continues to improve with sore throat now predominant symptom, President's physician says

articles.title: Ukraine works to resume grain exports, flags Russian strikes as risk
articles.description: Ukraine pressed ahead on Sunday with efforts to restart grain exports from its Black Sea ports under a deal aimed at easing global food shortages but warned deliveries would suffer if a Russian missile strike on Odesa was a sign of more to come.
